title: Generect
description:
Generect is a SaaS tool that finds up-to-minute data about ideal customers with valid emails.

Key Features:
	•	AI-Powered free lead search: Its like Sales Navigator + Crunchbase. We pull real-time data from there in live.
	•	Email Finder & Validation: Generect gives emails with 97.5% deliverability rate. Even 70% of catch-all domains are verified, reducing risky emails to just 5%.
	•	Excluded/Suppression lists: upload lists of leads/companies in order not to search for them in your searches.
